backend/main.mo: Defines game state types, dialogue nodes, activities, memorable moments, and exposes canister methods for starting and continuing a game.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module that returns the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing added troubleshooting documents, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of frontend source files across UI, game systems, scenes, and state management.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Developer guide explaining how to retry failed deployments and verify canister status.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide for maintaining canister availability and handling stopped or out‑of‑cycles states.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing screens, startup, backend availability checks, game launching, and diagnostics.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Config for a simple local admin username gate and associated storage key.
Defines the Activity interface and a list of activities that affect trust and may unlock moments.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Implements a Zustand-based audio manager with volume, mute control, and background music playback.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Renders the 3D Puro character with idle animation, hover effects, and click-to-open dialogue behavior.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Provides touch-based joystick and look controls for mobile devices with event handling and movement updates.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard, joystick, and look inputs into a unified movement and camera control state.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Lists customizable room items with names, descriptions, and allowed placement locations.
Defines a dialogue tree with nodes, choices, trust effects, and branching conversation paths.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main in‑game view rendering the 3D scene, HUD, menus, initialization logic, and pause system.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates letter responses based on keyword detection using friendly, curious, or encouraging templates.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Implements a book-sorting minigame where correct categorization affects trust and completes when all books are sorted.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A mini-game where players view a sequence of drawings, earning trust for each one viewed and a bonus for finishing all.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide-and-seek game where players guess hiding spots, affecting trust based on speed and accuracy.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Provides a menu to launch different mini-games and handles transitioning between them.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment with a title, scene text, and a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines the Moment interface and a list of unlockable narrative moments with trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the 3D library environment, handling player movement, camera control, and scene objects including Puro.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Zustand store managing UI state, trust, progress, customizations, letters, moments, and endings with persistence.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending types, a list of endings with trust thresholds, and a helper to select an ending based on trust level.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the ending based on trust level, unlocks it, and provides options to restart or return to title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Renders an activity selection menu that adjusts trust, completes activities, and unlocks moments.
Allows placing discovered customization items in the library and displays placed and available items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Shows dialogue nodes with choices that may affect trust and advance or close the conversation.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Lets players write letters and view responses, managing sending, validation, and inbox display.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays unlockable story moments and plays them when selected.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Provides pause options including resume, quick navigation, settings, resets, and admin terminal access.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Offers audio settings including mute toggle and volume slider with a back option.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Displays a trust meter using a progress bar and color-coded label based on trust level from game state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health via actor.isAvailable and exposes status, timing, errors, and a refetch method.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for game actions and state retrieval, invalidating gameState on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with a warm color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering App to the root element.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Runs one-time startup tasks including storage checks and asset preloading, with reset functionality.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store providing a simple local-only username gate for unlocking admin mode.
Zustand store persisting a toggle for enabling or disabling server access.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: Admin panel UI allowing users to unlock or lock admin mode with feedback and warnings.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays the Credits screen with description, features, and a backlink button.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Renders an admin-only diagnostic terminal with command input, output log, shortcuts, and server status checks.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Shows a launch error message with retry/back options and optional technical details.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: Error boundary that catches runtime errors, displays a fallback UI, and shows optional technical details.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Visual indicator showing backend status (online, offline, checking, or disabled).
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements terminal command handling for help, clear, server controls, status checks, and diagnostics output.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Defines diagnostics data and formats it into readable terminal lines describing app state and launch info.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Implements a Zustand store managing terminal visibility and input/output lines with append and clear functions.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Main title screen with game start options, admin tools, server toggle, and status indicator.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch errors into categorized user-friendly summaries for canister, save, and connectivity issues.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation of the app’s startup sequence, initialization steps, and extension guidelines.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including summary, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
